name: Mare Memoria
description:
An interactive fiction game about a teacher, you, to whom nothing really happens.

Mare Memoria follows the day to day life of a teacher in a fictional world. It looks at the theme of ritual in the everyday.

- Drink coffee or tea!
- Drudge through bureaucracy!
- Forget to take a shower!
- Find beauty in the monotony of everyday life!

This game was created in a week so it may be a bit buggy but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless.
_______________

Cw: Unhealthy relationships
Credits: All writing and cover art done by me.
